title: Cannot convert DataFrame to LabledPoint in sparkML
body:
I am using sparkMl 2.1.1,And I want to convert my dataframe to LabeledPoint in order to Using randomforest algorithmï¼ŒHere is my code:

    val session = SparkSession.builder().master("local[2]").appName("PM").getOrCreate()
val df: DataFrame = session.read.option("header", "true").csv(PMTrain.getClass.getResource("/") + "pm.csv")
val data = df.filter(!df.col("pm").isNaN)

val indexer = new StringIndexer()
  .setInputCol("cbwd")
  .setOutputCol("cbwd-")
val resultData = indexer.fit(data).transform(data).toDF().select("pm", "month", "day", "hour", "DEWP", "TEMP", "PRES", "cbwd-", "Iws", "Is", "Ir")

resultData.show()

I want the first column to be my Lable and the rest to be my Vector.Can anyone help ,appreciate that
